title: PocketMine-MP 远程IP联机问题
author: lingdidky
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lingdidky 于 2013-9-17 19:30 编辑 

本人新手小白，根据TylrDrdn 大大的教程 PocketMine-MP 架设的服务器开服，目前同wifi下能够登陆没有问题，可是换成远程ip地址登陆就显示   Unable to connect to world.    求各位大神帮忙解决！！！

另付  server.properties  

#Properties Config file
#Tue Sep 10 12:29:58 GMT 2013
server-name=Minecraft: PE Server
description=Server made using PocketMine-MP
motd=Welcome @player to this server!
server-ip=
server-port=19132
server-type=normal
memory-limit=128M
last-update=off
white-list=off
spawn-protection=0
view-distance=10
max-players=20
allow-flight=off
spawn-animals=on
spawn-mobs=on
gamemode=0
hardcore=off
pvp=off
difficulty=1
generator-settings=
level-name=world
level-seed=
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-query=on
enable-rcon=off
rcon.password=AywnxJJXtp
send-usage=on
auto-save=on
upnp-forwarding=on

replies.txt_content: 你在路由器里映射端口19132，ip填你电脑的试试

replies.author: 七由理
replies.txt_content:
我的是安卓版本过高不支持。可恶啊！
换个旧版的试试。

replies.author: qqabxiaojing
replies.txt_content: 我也是这种情况，，，试过好多端口映射工具了，，，结果就是不行！  PC版开服器一弄端口就映射成功！，，，，，PE版的怎么映射都不行！求解答,,,,,
